summary: This is a declaration by a custodian of records certifying the authenticity of FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 billed to Jeffrey Epstein. The document is part of records provided to law enforcement for an investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the person to whom FedEx Express invoices were billed, with his address listed as 457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY.

events.title: FedEx Express invoice creation
events.description: FedEx Express invoice numbered 4-397-85573 was created and billed to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A custodian of records certified FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 as authentic business records for law enforcement.
The invoices were billed to Jeffrey Epstein at 457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY.
The records were provided to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for an investigation and prosecution.
The declaration was made under penalty of perjury to establish the records' admissibility under Federal Rules of Evidence 902(11) and 803(6).
